sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.system.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    This object is the main controller of the vending machine. It coordinates the main operations of the VMCS.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController(java.lang.String propertyFile)
      This constructor creates an instance of MainController object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDown()
      This method destroys all the object instances created for opening the vending machine. It will instruct the SimulationController to close down (by closing down all the vending machine panels) and the TransactionController to close down. It will also close down other control objects and the entity objects created for simulating the vending machine.
      MachineryController getMachineryController()
      This method returns the MachineryController.
      MaintenanceController getMaintenanceController()
      This method returns the MaintenanceController.
      SimulationController getSimulationController()
      This method returns the SimulationController.
      SimulatorControlPanel getSimulatorControlPanel()
      This method returns the SimulatorControlPanel.
      StoreController getStoreController()
      This method returns the StoreController.
      TransactionController getTransactionController()
      This method returns the TransactionController.
      void initialize()
      This method creates all the control objects.
      void start()
      This method will initiate the creation of all the control objects necessary for simulation of the vending machine, and initiate the display of the SimulatorControlPanel (the main menu).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws VMCSException
        This method will initiate the creation of all the control objects necessary for simulation of the vending machine, and initiate the display of the SimulatorControlPanel (the main menu).
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to initialize.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws VMCSException
        This method creates all the control objects.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to load drinks properties or cash properties.

      • closeDown

        public void closeDown()
        This method destroys all the object instances created for opening the vending machine. It will instruct the SimulationController to close down (by closing down all the vending machine panels) and the TransactionController to close down. It will also close down other control objects and the entity objects created for simulating the vending machine.
